survey_name: AI-Powered Personal Finance Tool User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the usability, features, and overall satisfaction with AI-powered personal finance tools to help improve future product development.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options are clear and cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance tool?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal finance tool do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Show to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
